alert.note: Alert for Crockett (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 09 at 9:17PM CDT until June 09 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Crockett County in west central Texas... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 917 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over I-10 Near The Crockett-Pecos County Line, or over Sheffield, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Crockett County, including the following locations... The Intersection Of Us 190 And Highway 163, Ft Lancaster, The Intersection Of I-10 And Highway 290, I-10 Near The Crockett-Pecos County Line and Us-190 Near The Crockett-Sutton County Line. This includes Interstate 10 between Mile Markers 327 and 347. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
